eu.it_r3v.bibjsf.businesslogic

Class ReaderHandler

  • java.lang.Object
      • eu.it_r3v.bibjsf.businesslogic.ReaderHandler

  • public class ReaderHandler
extends
    A business handler for all reader data. It implements the business rules that apply to readers.
    Author:
    koschke

      • add

        public int add(Reader reader)
        throws DataSourceException,
               BusinessElementAlreadyExistsException
        Adds reader to database. Reader must not yet exist.
        Parameters:
        reader - new reader to be added
        Returns:
        the ID of the added reader
        Throws:
        DataSourceException - in case of problems with data source
        BusinessElementAlreadyExistsException - if the reader exists already in the database

      • importCSV

        public int importCSV(java.io.InputStream input)
              throws DataSourceException
        Reads all CSV data from input and stores them into the reader table.
        Parameters:
        input - the stream from where to read the CSV data
        Returns:
        the number of read and inserted readers
        Throws:
        InputException - thrown in case the input data cannot be processed completely
        DataSourceException - thrown if the data cannot be stored in the data source
